Well it is very difficult to predict what life would be in 2050 , but as per the current scenario , one can predict some sort of the life in 2050. Harsh reality: Life will going to be miserable in underdeveloped or even in some developing nations. Let’s take an example of our country , India. 1- The biggest problem with our country which politocians are unable to see is Overpopulation . It will create many problems by 2050 > It leads to deforestation due to colonialisation. > Overpopulation leads to the increasing number of vehicles on the roads. > Diminishing number of trees and increasing number of vehicles causes air pollution, Delhi is a concrete example of this. > It leads to increase in competition causing unemployment spreading its roots in the nation. > Unemployment tends to increase in crime rates. 2- Another major change will be of Technology. I cant predict what kind of technologies people will use in 2050 . There will be a complete change in almost every kind of activities whether it be transportation , communication and entertainment. 3- Mostly developed nations will make their immigration policies very rigid. No country wants migrants from underdeveloped nations enter their home country. 4- The governement sector will outsource most of their departements resulting in the cut in public sector jobs.
